short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse your new tab in mystery with the Hacker Red Screen live wallpaper, featuring a clock and Google search bar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your Chrome browsing experience with the Hacker Red Screen Live Wallpaper. This 4K wallpaper sets a tech-inspired tone, featuring an intense red glow and cybernetic graphics that evoke the world of hackers and digital espionage. The minimalist design ensures a sleek interface, complemented by a built-in clock and Google search bar for practicality. Perfect for tech enthusiasts, coders, and fans of cyberpunk aesthetics, this live wallpaper adds an edgy, futuristic vibe to your new tab.

Extension Features
4K Live Wallpaper:
High-resolution visuals featuring a glowing red hacker-themed screen.

Minimalist Layout:
A clean and modern interface that blends functionality with style.

Built-In Clock:
Keep track of time with a sleek, integrated clock on your new tab.

Google Search Bar:
Quick and easy access to search directly from your tab.

Dynamic and Futuristic:
The red screen aesthetic captures the essence of cyberpunk and tech culture.

Optimized Performance:
Lightweight and efficient for a smooth browsing experience.

Perfect for Tech Enthusiasts:
Add a touch of mystery and innovation to your browser with every tab you open.
